readable.title: 3516312179_f520469038
readable.content: a baseball player in a red shirt and white pants is swinging the bat towards a yellow ball whilst three people look on . A baseball player recoils from an action involving a bat while opposing team members look on . A girl in a red and white uniform is swinging a bat . A girl swings a bat during a softball game . A woman swings at a softball on a playing field while other players look on .
